channel.title: Brazil on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Brazil on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Oscars: Brazil Picks Wagner Moura’s ‘The Secret Agent’ as Best International Feature Submission
item.description: In Kleber Mendonça Filho’s 1970s-set political thriller, Moura plays a man trying to reunite with his family and flee the country before government killers hunt him down.
